p: Male Wistar rats with an average weight of 190-240 g were obtained from the animal house of the University of Medical Sciences, Kerman, Iran and animals were housed in a temperature-controlled room with a 12:12 h light/dark cycle condition with free access to food and water. The rats were acclimated to the laboratory for 1 week prior to the start of the experiment. All procedures were in accordance with guidelines for caring and using of laboratory animals in Neuroscience Research Center of Kerman University of Medical Sciences and the Neuroscience Ethic Committee (EC/KNRC/89-5A).
